ayah: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا
ayah_translit: la yasma'una fiha laghwan wala tathiman
ayah_english: Not they will hear therein vain talk and not sinful (speech)

ayah: وَكَانُواْ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ
ayah_translit: wakanu yaquluna a-idha mit'na wakunna turaban wa'izaman a-inna lamab'uthuna
ayah_english: And they used (to) say When we die and become dust and bones will we surely be resurrected

ayah: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ
ayah_translit: nahnu qaddarna baynakumu al-mawta wama nahnu bimasbuqina

ayah: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِي مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: ala an nubaddila amthalakum wanunshi-akum fi ma la ta'lamuna
ayah_english: In that We (will) change your likeness[es] and produce you in what not you know

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ
ayah_translit: law nashau laja'alnahu hutaman fazaltum tafakkahuna

ayah: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ
ayah_translit: a-antum anzaltumuhu mina al-muz'ni am nahnu al-munziluna
